rules.description: left_control to HYPER (SHIFT+COMMAND+OPTION+CONTROL) or ESCAPE (If Alone)

manipulators.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+,
Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+.

from.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+/

rules.description: Cmd-f to C-a + tab in terminal
Cmd-shift-f to C-a + F in terminal
C-z to C-a + z in terminal
Cmd-9 to tmux go to last window in terminal
ctrl-tab to ctrl-a + n in terminal
ctrl-shift-tab to ctrl-a + p in terminal
Cmd-l to ctrl-a + n in terminal
Cmd-h to ctrl-a + p in terminal
double left shift to C-c in terminal
double left shift to M-x in chrome
double left shift to M-x in emacs

to.shell_command:
osascript -e 'set temp to the clipboard 
 set the clipboard to "consult " 
 tell application "System Events" 
   keystroke "v" using command down 
   delay 0.1 
 end tell 
 set the clipboard to temp'
